description: Source code for SplashActivity, an Android activity that displays a splash screen with animations and transitions to the main activity after a delay.

classes.name: SplashActivity
classes.description: Android Activity class responsible for displaying a splash screen with animations and transitioning to the main activity.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, initializes views, animations, and schedules transition.

methods.name: initializeViews
methods.description: Finds view components and sets initial alpha states for animation.

methods.name: startAnimations
methods.description: Loads and starts animations on view components with specified delays.

methods.name: scheduleTransition
methods.description: Schedules transition to MainActivity after splash timeout.

methods.name: onBackPressed
methods.description: Overrides back button to disable back navigation during splash screen.
